category-def.name: Memory Analyzer IDE
category-def.label: Memory Analyzer for Eclipse IDE
category-def.description: Memory Analyzer features suitable for installing into or updating an Eclipse IDE.

category-def.name: Memory Analyzer RCP
category-def.label: Stand-alone Memory Analyzer
category-def.description: Memory Analyzer features suitable for updating a stand-alone version of Memory Analyzer which is based on Eclipse RCP.
